titleStmt.title: Śrīraṅgam, Ranganātha temple, east wall of third prākāra

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Creation of the file on the repository

lg.l: 2 pukaḻmātu viḷaṅka jayamātu virumpa nilamakaḷ vaḷara malarmakaḷ
puṇara Urimaiyiṟciṟan=ta? maṇimuṭi cūṭi mīṉavar nilaikeṭa
pāyat tikkaṉaittilu n=tan cakkaram naṭātti vīrasiṃhāsanattu

div.p: kōvirājakesarivanmarāna cakravarttikaḷ śrī kolōttuṅkacōḻa tēvaṟku yāṇṭu patinjañcāvatu 2? pāṇṭi 4. kulācaniviḷānāṭṭu tiruvaraṅkattāḻvān kōyilil nivantakkāṟaril vaṅkippurattu X4 tiruvaraṅkattunampiyum 5. ivan makan mannaṉ tiruvaraṅka*nampiyum mannaṉ veṇṇaikkūttanāna tirukkaṇ.ãpurattaraiyarum mannaṉ tiruviṇṇakānampiyum 6. mannaṉ tirunāṭṭunampiyum āka ivvaṉaivom arumoḻitēvavaḷanāṭṭu nemmalināṭṭu koṭṭur koṭṭuruṭaiyān āyarkoḻun 7. tu cakkarapāṇiyāna senāpatikaḷ viracoḻamuṉaiyataraiyarkku nāṅkaḷ kaittiṭṭukkuṭutta paricāvatu ikkōyililē-y āḻavānukku tiru 8. ppaḷḷiˍelucci tiruvāymoḻi viṇṇappam ceyyakkaṭavomāka ivarpakkal nāṇkaḷ koṇṭa cempon jampatin kaḻañcu ippon ja 9. mpatin kaḻañcu(ṅ) koṇṭu X6 keraḷāntakavaḷanāṭṭu uṟaiyūrkkūṟṟattu pramhatēyam? rājāśrīyaccaruppetimaṅkalattu nila 10. ttilē patinālā n=tarattilē-y nilaṅ koṇṭu irupatān tarattilē-y taram Iḻicci Iṟaiyiṟuttu Ittāl vanta virutti X10 11. kavum cantirā X11tiruppaḷḷiṟluccit tiruvāymoḻi viṇṇappañ ceyyakkāṭa voyāka X9 12. pañceyya X6 patineṭṭunāṭṭu śrīvayiṣṇavarkaḷē-y taṅaḷukkeṟina?taṇṭaṅ koṇṇtum viṇṇappam ceyvikkakaṭavōmāka
